title: Indian financial sector remains insulated from Microsoft global outage: RBI
description: The Reserve Bank of India confirms that the Indian financial sector is largely unaffected by the global Microsoft outage. Only minor disruptions reported in a few banks and NBFCs, which are being resolved. RBI issues advisory for operational continuity. Most banks and payment aggregators report no impact on services.
